features: Note: For iPhone users, please make sure that you use the adapter included in the product packaging, which does not require any additional purchase.

Plug and Play: No Bluetooth or APP needed. The wireless lavalier microphone can be clipped to the collar for hands-free audio and video recording. Just need to plug the receiver into your device, and power on the microphone, it will start working for you soon.

65FT Transmission & Rechargeable : This lavaier mic has a stable audio signal, the longest wireless transmission distance can reach 65FT and the high-quality DSP chip can bring more stable transmission. Wireless microphone transmitter has built-in rechargeable battery with working time up to 8 hours.

Omnidirectional Mic with Noise Reduction: The built-in intelligent active noise reduction chip allows you to record clearly in noisy environments, which can provides more vivid, soft, natural and stereo sound around for recording or real time video.

Compatible with Most Devices: With the FREE Type-C to Lightning Ports, the lavalier mic can compatible with iPhone and iPad. Samsung Galaxy S21/S20/S10+/S10e/S10, Note 20 Ultra/20/10+/9 and most USB Type-C port devices
What You Get: 2 TX (2 Transmitters) + 1 RX(1 Receiver ) + Charging Case + 2 Charging cable+Lightning adapter+Instruction. Our worry-free 18-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Built-in Innovative DSP Microchip New DSP chip brings more efficient and stable voice signal processing - can record more details even in complex scenarios. It can easily cope with various noisy environments and truly restore human voices.Upgraded wireless transmission technology - the wireless lavalier mic is capable of recording clear and stable audio at distances of up to 65ft and also 0.009s delay in transmission allow you to move around.The original sound quality - Store the sound with a quality to be as same as original, or even better. Ideal for Bloggers, Journalists, Fitness coaches and Teachers. Intelligent Noise Reduction Technology Cordless condenser mics capture clear and rich HD audio, lapel lavalier microphone with smart noise reduce, noise reduction technology could filter background noise to ensure clear and reliable audio, which can help you get a better sound experience, and also can mike for recording videos for YouTube, Facebook or TikTok. Real-Time Clear Voice Auto-Sync Omnidirectional condenser microphone, 360° surround pickup, full band audio 48kHz Stereo CD quality, clearer recording. Charging while working For the convenience of ultra-long duration creators, the wireless lavalier microphone and system support simultaneous working and charging, providing you with unlimited battery life.

Easy Automatic Connection No Adapter, Bluetooth or Application needed. Free of wire.While using the lav mic, you can charge your device simultaneously with the charging cable.The wireless clip-on microphone is equipped with a Lightning adapter and a charging cable. Up to 8 Hours of Battery Life The lavaier wireless mic is built in a large capacity battery with the low-power consumption design makes you enjoy up to 8 hours of recording without needing to recharge.One pairing with two microphone for multiplayers in different situations. High Audio Quality with 360° Surround High Density Spray-proof Sponge and High-sensitivity Microphone - Our microphone could records detail of the sound clearly regardless of surrounded environment.

Wide Range of Application Real-time Crystal Voice Syncs with less delay - wireless lavalier microphone support real time monitor, know better what you are recording and podcasting.Support Multi-Channel Real-Time Mixing - Online teaching, video recording, living streaming, interview, vlogging, presentation, virtual conference, etc.Support Multiple Media Platforms Recording - Youtube, facebook, google + , instagram, tiktok, and any channel what need clear recorded audio.

Widely Used Lapel Mics for Most Type C Device FAQ Q: Why only one of my two microphone transmitters can work? A: To make sure both of 2 TX can be connected with RX, please turn on the microphones before you plug to your phone. Step1 :Turn on your microphones Step2 : Plug to your phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Sound and Ease of Use with the 2 Pack Professional Wireless Lavalier Microphone
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 2 Pack Professional Wireless Lavalier Microphone, and I have been thoroughly impressed with its performance. The delivery was incredibly fast, which was a pleasant surprise, allowing me to put these microphones to use much sooner than anticipated.Setting up the microphones was a breeze. The instructions provided were clear and straightforward, making it easy for someone who isn't particularly tech-savvy, like myself, to get everything up and running in no time. This hassle-free setup is a significant advantage for those who need professional sound quality without the complexities often associated with audio equipment.The sound quality of these lavalier microphones is simply awesome. Whether I'm recording a podcast, conducting interviews, or using them for live presentations, the audio captured is crystal clear, with minimal background noise. The wireless feature has been a game-changer, offering freedom of movement without compromising on sound quality. It's remarkable how such a compact device can deliver such powerful and professional audio performance.What I appreciate the most is the reliability of these microphones. I've used them in various settings, indoors and outdoors, and they've consistently delivered excellent sound quality. The battery life is also commendable, ensuring that I can get through long sessions without worrying about running out of power.In conclusion, I would highly recommend the 2 Pack Professional Wireless Lavalier Microphone to anyone in need of high-quality, reliable, and easy-to-use audio equipment. Whether you're a professional videographer, a content creator, or someone who frequently conducts interviews, these microphones will undoubtedly meet and exceed your expectations. Their combination of fast delivery, effortless setup, and exceptional sound quality makes them a worthwhile investment for anyone looking to improve their audio recording capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The microphones are super cool! They are super easy to connect to the phone and the sound quality is great when clipped on the shirt. The sounds quality lowers a little when you have the mic closer to your mouth when holding it but overall would recommend this product for anyone to buy. I think they are way cool. I also bought the ones that only connect to Apple products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product works very good. Just use my phone to record in my shop and you could hear the echo in my voice. I purchased these, and it made my voice very clear in my videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have for your Collection of Top-Quality Supplies from Amazon!
reviews.reviewText: These little portable mics are life saving and high quality. I have used them for some of my podcast episodes, interviews, and crafting videos. They are so easy to use and so great for capturing the little moments with people you enjoy having deep convos with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Failed in less than 5 months
reviews.reviewText: this device was Delivered Jul 12, 2023 and it is now Dec 2023 and the device has failed already.Lets go into details. First the quality of the mic and both receivers were very light and fragile feeling. I was only able to test the receivers once and they failed within a week later. Because the mic had an iPhone adaptor I was able to use it on the iPhone we use to stream on Sundays. So the mic half lasted longer only because it was being used once a week for only an hour. I did not charge it every day so that it would not overcharge, but that didn't work because it stopped working and no longer would charge via the charging case. (Now I tried to return it and the window closed for returns in August) my advice...keep searching

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Large logo, doeent fit with phone case
reviews.reviewText: I've seen mixed reviews for people who have received this with the big white logo, and some who didn't have the logo. Ofcourse I received the one with the logo. I'm not really into free advertisement and don't want the big white noticeable logo on my lapel mic in all my videos, so I used a razor blade (You can use sandpaper also) and scraped the logo off. It came off very easily, although now I have superficial scratches on the mics. The mere fact that i even needed to scrape the logo off makes me drop this to 3 stars. Idc that the logo is on the reciever, but this company should know better than to put their logo on the mics knowing people will be making videos. Also, the receiver doesn't fit it youre using a phone case. I have to completely remove my phone case to use this thing. Set up was easy, once i plugged in the reciever, i pressed and held the button on one of the mics until the light turned green. No searching for device via bluetooth which was nice. As for sounds quality, it seems to be okay. I tried it in my garage where I will be making my instructional videos, and you could hear me well, and it dampened some of the echo. But when a truck went by, the sound of the truck was distorted. In all, it does what it is intended to do and it's better than the raw mic on my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I saw this in a video for the Hover X1. Easy to set up and use. It has excellent sound and range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They only work for my social media apps, but that could just be an issue with my phone camera, idk ..... But the sound quality is better than I expected!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice kit and well pleased.Read the instructions on connection or it dont record.......Easy to set up as no app required.Done a few test runs and will be good enough for what I have in mind. Many Thanks. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Does not work with Moto G native camera app [UPDATE]
reviews.reviewText: Not recognised as an audio device by Moto G. Pairing lights all light up, but not recognised as a microphone by the phone.[UPDATE] the issue is with the native Moto camera app and any other app that uses that for video. The microphones are recognised by third party apps such as ProCam X. This may or may not suit everyone's requirements, so be aware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Brought this microphone for going live on tiktok but is crackerly and static.Other than that is brilliant for voice notes, videos and calls

reviews.reviewText: Brilliant at background noise reduction and great value for money.

reviews.reviewText: Only grumbles are the charging box which is really hard to open and the really tiny lightning adapter which if far too easy to use and obviously an afterthought as it can’t be stored in the best place which is the box!
